name: Ethereum
description:
Ether, or ETH, is the native token of the Ethereum blockchain. Wrapped ETH, or WETH, refers to an ERC-20 compatible version of ether. ERC-20 is a technical standard developed after the release of ETH that allows tokens created on the Ethereum blockchain to interact with each other. 
In order for ETH to be exchanged with other ERC-20s it needs to be wrapped into WETH. Wrapping ETH does not affect its value, 1 ETH = 1 WETH.

In order for ETH to be exchanged with other ERC-20s it needs to be wrapped into WETH. Wrapping ETH does not affect its value, 1 ETH = 1 WETH.

tr.description:
Ether veya ETH, Ethereum blok zincirinin yerel belirtecidir. Sarılmış ETH veya WETH, eterin ERC-20 uyumlu bir versiyonunu ifade eder. ERC-20, Ethereum blok zincirinde oluşturulan belirteçlerin birbirleriyle etkileşime girmesine izin veren ETH'nin piyasaya sürülmesinden sonra geliştirilen teknik bir standarttır. 
ETH'nin diğer ERC-20'lerle değiştirilebilmesi için WETH'e sarılması gerekir. ETH sarma değerini etkilemez, 1 ETH = 1 WETH.

vi.description:
Ether, or ETH, is the native token of the Ethereum blockchain. Wrapped ETH, or WETH, refers to an ERC-20 compatible version of ether. ERC-20 is a technical standard developed after the release of ETH that allows tokens created on the Ethereum blockchain to interact with each other. 
In order for ETH to be exchanged with other ERC-20s it needs to be wrapped into WETH. Wrapping ETH does not affect its value, 1 ETH = 1 WETH.

zh.description: Ether，也被称为 ETH，是以太坊网络的原生代币。封装的 ETH，也被称为 WETH，是 ERC20 版本的的 ether。ERC20 是以太坊网络的标准，符合该标准的代币可以在以太坊上进行交互。如果要将 ETH 换为其他 ERC20 代币，就需要先将其打包成 WETH。WETH 与 ETH 的价值会保持 1:1 的比例。

hi.description:
ईथर, या ETH, एथेरियम ब्लॉकचेन का मूल टोकन है। रैप्ड ETH, या WETH, ईथर के ERC-20 संगत संस्करण को संदर्भित करता है। ERC-20 एक तकनीकी मानक है जिसे ETH के जारी होने के बाद विकसित किया गया है जो एथेरियम ब्लॉकचेन पर बनाए गए टोकन को एक दूसरे के साथ बातचीत करने की अनुमति देता है। 
ETH को अन्य ERC-20 के साथ एक्सचेंज करने के लिए इसे WETH में लपेटने की जरूरत है। ETH रैपिंग इसके मूल्य को प्रभावित नहीं करता है, 1 ETH = 1 WETH।

In order for ETH to be exchanged with other ERC-20s it needs to be wrapped into WETH. Wrapping ETH does not affect its value, 1 ETH = 1 WETH.
